price: Dhugumatti, isaannan amananii (Rabbiin) sodaattota ta’aniif mindaa Aakiraatu caala.
arabic: وَلَأَجۡرُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَكَانُواْ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wala-ajru al-ākhirati khayrun lilladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūna
